TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
SE: But in return you can never sleep.

SP: I can astral project to anywhere.

A super new page.

Edited March 15, 2022 by ColdJ

SE: You need to rest for 10 years after one project. 

SP: My Jeb is invincible.

SE: Can't interact with solid matter and just floats off into the universe.

SP: Can solve any problem.

SE: Your life is boring. 

SP: I'm Jeb.

SE: You are currently floating alone out in the universe.

SP: I can always find the silver lining.

SE: You have a bomb that is gonna explode.

SP: Nothing.

SE: Lonliness.

SP: I can counteract negativity.

SE: You're always negative

SP: I can undo climatechange

SE: It causes an ice age.

SP:You are the best artist in the world.

SE: everyone gets bored of your work, and because it’s the renaissance, you get burned at the stake

SP: i wanna be able to crash planes with my mind and not have to pay for it in any way

SE: As your super power is "wanting" you want all you like but never get.

SP: I can make carpets fly.

SE: you fly a musty carpet, and you get coated in dust and lint

SP: I can instantly pack for trips & return trips

SE: No physics available in your multiverse. 

SP: Never crash a craft in KSP.

SE: All your crafts have a lag-inducing part count.

SP: I can shrink.

SE: You can only shrink your head

SP: Omnipotence!

SE: I dunno. 

SP: I have infinite Thermonuclear bombs.

SE: The first one wipes you out.

SP: Technomage.

SE: Anti-tech. 

SP: I can manipulate gravity.

SE: You can only pull stuff down, in the direction of earth.

SP: I can understand all animals, and they all can understand me.

SE: You once said something they didn't like and now they constantly call insults.

SP: I can phase shift.

SE:you can only do it when asleep

SP:easy mod install

SE: The mods only work with outdated versions of the game.

SP: Perfect archery skills.

SE: You can only shot good guys. 

SP: I'm a perfect sniper with a perfect sniper rifle.

SE: too bad all your bullets contain 10 times the normal amount of gun power

SP: I’m the best pilot on earth

SE:you can only fly the  wright brothers plane

SP:best rocket builder
